scripts.dev: npm run cleanup && npm run build:ownable.js && vite || echo 'Starting Vite without ownable.js' && vite
scripts.build: npm run build:ownable.js && tsc -b && vite build || echo 'Building without ownable.js' && tsc -b && vite build
scripts.build:ownable.js: npm run clean && webpack --config ownable-js.webpack.js --no-stats && npm run clean && echo 'Successfully built ownable.js' || echo 'Failed to build ownable.js'
scripts.check-folders: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const folders=['pkg','schema','target']; let found=false; folders.forEach(f => { if (fs.existsSync(f)) { console.log('Found '+f); found=true; fs.rmSync(f, {recursive:true}); } }); process.exit(found ? 1 : 0);"
scripts.rustup: curl https://sh.rustup.rs -sSf | sh; curl https://rustwasm.github.io/wasm-pack/installer/init.sh -sSf | sh; rustup default stable; rustup update stable; rustup target add wasm32-unknown-unknown
scripts.ownables:build: if test -f ./ownables/$npm_config_package/Cargo.toml; then rm -rf ./ownables/$npm_config_package/pkg/ && wasm-pack build --out-name ownable --target web ./ownables/$npm_config_package/ && cd ./ownables/$npm_config_package/ && cargo schema && cd ../../ && zip -r -j ./ownables/$npm_config_package.zip ./ownables/$npm_config_package/assets/* ./ownables/$npm_config_package/pkg/*.js ./ownables/$npm_config_package/pkg/*.wasm ./ownables/$npm_config_package/pkg/package.json ./ownables/$npm_config_package/schema/*.json && rm -rf ./ownables/$npm_config_package/pkg/ ./ownables/$npm_config_package/schema/ ./ownables/$npm_config_package/target/; else zip -r -j ./ownables/$npm_config_package.zip ./ownables/$npm_config_package/*; fi
scripts.ownables:build-all: for DIR in $(ls ./ownables); do test -d ./ownables/$DIR && npm run ownables:build --package=$DIR; done
